name: Colonization: ZERO
description:
You are both sent on a mission to colonize all of space, and it's not going to be easy. You can colonize, while your buddy attacks! Will you be able to work along side each other to conquer the vast depths of space?

Colonization: ZERO, an entry for the GMTK Game Jam 2021.

Remember to post your highscore in the comments below! My personal best is 5432!

    to pause the game!

     to move around!

     to COLONIZE!

Programming and Art: Adam Phoebe (me!)

Music: HAID and Meta.

Current Version: 1.0 (Jam Version)
